original_title: I'll Fuck Your Wife If You Fuck Mine 3
overview: Let's face it, men just want to fuck... anyone, anytime! But if you're married, things are not that simple. But when you find out your wife also wants to fuck anyone, anytime... it's time to party!! And what a coincidence, your good buddy and his wife feel the same way. So invite them over, strip and get to the fucking, because you know that once is never enough when it comes to multiple sex partners. You lucky fuckers!
title: I'll Fuck Your Wife If You Fuck Mine 3
